tool_description: It provides sport news from different sources
name: Sports news
title: Sports news

api_list.name: Certain newspaper news
api_list.description: This endpoint gives you news from a certain newspaper that specified
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sports-news1.p.rapidapi.com/sportsnews/thehindu"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sports-news1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://sports-news1.p.rapidapi.com/sportsnews/{newspaperid}"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All newspapers Sports data
